entry.title: About
entry.content:
Welcome to my personal technical blog!

This blog will mainly record my thoughts about computer science.

Any comment is welcomed, however you need to register a Disqus account to comment.

Please contact me by sending an email to yuxixin911@gmail.com.

RSS is available and please subscribe if you are interested.

Currently in Changchun, China.

于曦昕/Xixin Yu
Computer Science Dept.
University of Bristol
